rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No content illegal in the United States of America.
Do not share false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm.
No spam, no direct advertising selling products or services, no aggressive promotion. If you promote your website, blog, etc do it responsibly and use a description and tags.
Bots must be marked as Bot in their profile
Agree to the Code of Conduct and Terms of Services

records.text: One more thing and then I'm done posting about this.Let's say Biden somehow gets re-elected and we avoid Trump part 2 and Project 2025. What happens if Biden dies in office or steps down? We get our first woman President and our second Black President. Also, our government isn't based just on the performance of our President. It's based on the President's advisors and key appointees. Don't you remember President Cheney? Or, when a person named Bannon and one named Flynn were put in leadership positions?  It is so hard for people to see the bigger picture as our society is driven by moments. A picture here. A headline there. We get blinded by the noise of the news cycle and forget the objective.
